column5: I'm still staring down an 8" hole in the ice up here.  3' of ice actually.  Here's some pics from the weekend.  Lac Seul walleye and pike.      When 1 or 2 minnows just isn't enough.    Yesterday we hit up a laker lake for a couple hours.  I got the only 2 lake trout and I'm certain that the only reason I did was because I had a flasher.   White tube jigs took both fish over 45 FOW.  It's an easy spot close to town that you can drive and walk out to on Big Vermillion Lake.      Same fish, close up.
Nice shootin Ben. Enjoy... works    comin soon me friend! lol
Love your reports man, but watching all that snow and ice makes me shiver a little bit hahaha.
Hmmmm.... I can still get on that two year new hospital construction job in Sioux Lookout if I wanted. Got a spare bedroom for rent??
Wait till we hit some late ice or ice out brookies Dan.
Oh yeah. May long weekend ice out Brookies is a favorite of mine. If the ice is out. 50/50 chance this year with the long cold winter we experienced.
Sure are some beaut's, good job...

nice looking walleye...wow...three minnows......hungry walleye up there. I'm sitting here torn at the moment, got the green light from the missus for fishing the next couple of days.....do i go for walleye or trout.....guess i better get to thunder for both hopefully.  Gotta love all the ice still about...snowmachine might be retiring soon though.
Love that second picture ( magazine worthy)  TB
nice looking assortment.  That pike looks very healthy....  actaully, they all do.
Great report and pics Ben  There's nothing more I can say except..... AWESOME and great job Thanks for sharing and keep it up!!  Leechman
Thanks for sharing.  Great report.

Beauty colors on those lakers...most that I get down here are quite dark except for a few lakes. I also can't wait for those ice out brookies...best time of the year....bring on the 12 ft,  the electric and the gang trolls!!!!!
Way to go! Good looking fish
Beauty fish Ben!    Normally I might admit that I am very jealous but seeing all the ice and snow in the background helps minimize it to just a wee jealous  lol
Beauties, got admit though I'm liking those lakers!
Ahh Sioux Lookout area. Sure do miss it there. Nice fish! Keep posting the pics Ben and I will be making a trip back out there this summer!
Awsome report,great lookin lakers,but oh that pike!!!! Your livin in heavin. Keep them reports comin
Beautiful shots!  Thanks for the report.

We don't need to tell you, you are spoiled right Ben?  Nice fish pal.....I'd say I miss the ice already, but I'm looking forward to some soft water Crappies, Walters and Bass Opener way too much at this point
Yeah I know it Abberz.     And I'm in the middle of a 2 day trip even farther north right now.
